Typography

Headlines — Cormorant Garamond
Building hope through education, food & care
Body Text — Outfit
For over a decade, Mission Village Relief has built schools, provided food, and cared for orphans in Africa. Your giving fuels meals, classrooms, and long-term stability.

Logo Concepts

Choose a concept that resonates with your mission. Each can be refined and paired with the wordmark.

Rising Sun Child

Child silhouette within a warm sun. Hope, new beginnings, children at the heart.

Africa Heart

Africa continent shape with heart. Love for the continent and its people.

Caring Hands

Hands cradling a sun/child. Nurturing, protection, hands-on care.

Village Home

Simple village huts with sun. Community, shelter, home.

Tree of Life

Acacia tree with fruit. Growth, sustainability, bearing fruit.

Shield of Care

Protective shield with child. Safety, protection, defense.

Sunrise Hills

Sun rising over African hills. New day, hope, landscape.

Circle of Children

Children connected in a circle. Community, unity, togetherness.

Book of Light

Open book with rising sun. Education, knowledge, enlightenment.

Heart & Hands

Heart shape with embracing hands. Love, compassion, embrace.

Dove of Hope

Bird flying toward sun. Freedom, hope, peace, new life.

Faith & Love

Cross with heart. Faith-based mission, love in action.

Ready to create your logo?

Use these concepts with Canva, Figma, Adobe Illustrator, or share with a designer to create your final logo.
